about_the_game:
Learn the shots, practice against the AI then challenge your family and friends.

A single button flips your flippers but gives you precise control of your shots. Master your timing, improve your reactions to your opponent, learn all the tricks and develop your own techniques until the ball is under your control and scoring becomes second nature.

Whether you're a casual gamer or a competitive player, Flippee Ball offers a satisfying experience that's easy to pick up but hard to master. Download now and start your journey to becoming a Flippee Ball champion.

The demo version on Steam includes:

  • Simple to understand gameplay…
  • …but deep and rewarding technique mastery.
  • Single button control and minimal interface.
  • “Medium” difficulty (difficulty level 50 out of 100).
  • Maximum game time of 3 minutes.
  • Configurable flipper power.
  • Buzzer beaters.
  • No ads ever.

The full version on Steam unlocks the full game including:

  • Player vs. Player mode using the same device.
  • Multiple Difficulty Modes.
  • Track your longest winning streaks against the AI with four difficulty levels:
    • “Easy” (0/100)
    • “Medium” (50/100)
    • “Hard” (100/100)
    • “Progressive” – where the difficulty starts at “Easy” and increases with every win
  • “Continual” mode where your progress against the AI is saved even if you lose.
  • Increase game length to 30 minutes.
  • Track your stats:
    • Longest winning streaks.
    • Highest difficulty reached.
    • Highest and average points-per-minute (a great metric to see how well you’re playing regardless of game mode).
    • Highest shot – see how high you can hit the ball - pointless (literally!) but fun.
    • Played, won, lost, percentage won, scored for, scored against.

Flippee Ball. Simple. Skilful.
